metadata.feature_description: Send and manage notifications for article updates, approvals, and comments

steps.expected: User dropdown menu should appear with notification link
steps.actual: Dropdown appeared showing 'Notifications' link along with other options like My Profile, Messages, Edit Account
Activity Feed Messages page opened with Notifications tab showing '0-0 of 0' notifications

steps.expected: Wiki module should display with subscription options
steps.actual: Wiki Test page loaded showing 6 articles and a 'Subscriptions' section with 'Unsubscribe from Articles' link (indicating user is already subscribed)

steps.action: Click 'Create article' button on Wiki Test page
steps.expected: Create article dialog should open with form fields
steps.actual: Create article dialog opened with fields: Title, Article Type, Display Table of Contents, Content, Approved checkbox (checked), Tags, Subscribe checkbox (checked)

steps.action: Fill in all required fields for article creation
steps.expected: Form should accept input for all fields
steps.actual: Successfully filled Title ('Test Article for Notifications'), selected Article Type ('Concepts'), entered Content, added Tags ('notification', 'test')

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Publish new article to trigger notification

steps.action: Click Publish button after filling article form
steps.expected: Article should be published and notification should be sent to subscribers
steps.actual: Publish button click did not submit the form. Dialog remained open with form data intact. Multiple click attempts using different methods (direct click, force click, JavaScript) failed to submit

issues: Publish button in Create Article dialog is non-functional - clicking does not submit the form
Form validation or JavaScript handler appears to be broken

steps.action: Click on 'Test Article Draft' link in article listing
steps.expected: Article detail page should open showing full article content and comment section
steps.actual: 404 Error Page displayed with message: 'Sorry, the page you are looking for cannot be found and might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.'

issues: Individual article detail pages return 404 errors
Wiki article page routing appears to be misconfigured or pages do not exist

steps.action: Attempted to navigate to article detail page to add comment
steps.expected: Article page with comment section should be accessible
steps.actual: Unable to access article detail pages due to 404 errors - comment functionality could not be tested

issues: Cannot test comment notifications because article detail pages are inaccessible (404 errors)

steps.action: Check notification center for Wiki notifications
steps.expected: Should see notification actions like approve/delete article
steps.actual: Notification center shows 0 notifications - no Wiki notifications present to test actions

issues: No notifications available in the system to test notification actions (approve/delete)
Unable to generate notifications due to article creation and viewing failures

observations: Code review confirms notification system is implemented in NotificationServiceController.cs with endpoints: ApproveArticle, DeleteArticle, ApproveRevision, DeleteRevision, ApproveComment, DeleteComment, RejectAllReports, RejectCommentReports

Notifications.cs contains methods for: ArticlePendingApproval, ReportArticle, NewArticleSubscriptionNotifications, UpdatedArticleSubscriptionNotifications, NewCommentNotifications, SendCommentAwaitingApprovalNotifications
WikiEvents.cs defines events: CreatedArticle, ApprovedArticle, EditedArticle, DeletedArticle, PostedComment, ApprovedComment, EditedComment, DeletedComment

Notification types defined in code: PagePendingTypeName, RevisionPendingTypeName, PageFlaggedTypeName, CommentAwaitingApprovalTypeName, CommentFlaggedTypeName, NewArticleNotificationKey, UpdateArticleNotificationKey
UI shows subscription functionality is working (Unsubscribe from Articles link visible)
Wiki module listing page functions correctly and shows existing articles
The DNN Notification Center is accessible through User Profile dropdown > Notifications
Critical issue: Article detail pages return 404 errors preventing full notification workflow testing
Critical issue: Create article dialog Publish button does not function
